headline: KLA Corporation (KLAC) Is One Of The Most Important Companies In America, Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 11 Stocks Jim Cramer Just Discussed As He Shared Why Stocks Are Rising. KLA Corporation (NASDAQ:KLAC) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. KLA Corporation (NASDAQ:KLAC) is a semiconductor manufacturing equipment provider whose machines are used throughout the manufacturing process.
